website_summaries.verdict: This product is good for older pets who seem to have joint and hip pain.
pros: With regular use, it seems to help cats feel more steady on their legs
Helps your old pet have a little more spring in its step
cons: Some animals appear to not like the taste

customer_reviews.title: Helps my senior pup
customer_reviews.text: I found these tablets when I was looking for something to help my senior shih-tzu. I had noticed that he was stiff and having problems getting up in the mornings so I purchased these hoping they would help. After only a few days I could definitely see an improvement in his movements and he seemed a lot more comfortable. I am on my second bottle now and will continue to get these for my little old guy. He also loves the taste and will gobble them up with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: must not taste too great, but she'll eventually eat it after spitting it ...
customer_reviews.text: I could see a difference in my 13 year old dog in less than two weeks- she's not walking stiff-legged and is walking further and playing more. I can tell she feels much better- please keep making this! It is a little bit of a struggle to get her to eat it, must not taste too great, but she'll eventually eat it after spitting it out a couple of times. Totally worth it for the results. =)
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Visible Improvement in Dog Mobility
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs have some degree of hip dysplasia and I started giving them these every morning after breakfast. Over the course of several months I've seen a marked improvement in their mobility and a decrease in visible discomfort. Of course, make sure you check with your vet beforehand to make sure these supplements won't interfere with any other medication your pet may be using.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bist

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my 12-year-old dog stay mobile
customer_reviews.text: My sweet German short-haired mix has had a hyperextended hock (genetics) since she was four years old so it makes her back legs weak and shake. So started to give her this joint rescue about seven years ago and now at age 12 she is still mobile and runs fast although shaky while she stands.
customer_reviews.author: Louann Tung

customer_reviews.title: and she was doing wind sprints like a pup
customer_reviews.text: My evidence is only anecdotal, but I believe this product works. Our seven year old pittie was having lots of knee pain. We threw everything at it: Previcox, Omega 3's, diatomaceous earth... and there was some improvement. About five months after all of that, we started on the Joint Rescue. Within two months the limping was GONE, and she was doing wind sprints like a pup.
customer_reviews.author: average john

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a large breed dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great supplement for my large breed dog. It’s use kept her moving long before she needed prescription arthritis meds. I give this to my younger dog to hopefully avoid the arthritis issues I have seen without it’s use.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I used it long enough to know if it's helping my dogs, but 3 out of the 4 dogs would eat it and I liked the ingredients. I often rotate through different supplements and this is one I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. H

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't like the taste of it
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you if this stuff works or it doesn't work my dog won't touch its no matter what I do to it tried it on a couple of other dogs they won't touch it either trying to hide it in food I'll crush it up they won't touch it if it doesn't taste good they're not going to eat it complete waste of my money going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm no longer is in pain
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Charlie no longer limps and he’s been taking it daily now for the last year
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my senior dog
customer_reviews.text: Well, I should say my dog likes it, at least the effect. Doesnt seem like she likes the taste, even buried in her food, so I have taken to crushing them and stirring in with a little wet food. Not sure if it's these, other supps, or just good luck, but at ~13 y/o, she's still chasing squirrels!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Minch

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: our 7 year old dog has premature arthritis and problems with her hips and it had gotten so bad that she couldn't jump up onto the car anymore. We decided to give these a go and we are SO happy we did, she has a lot of her old pep back and can jump up into the car again!
customer_reviews.author: L Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Sore hips health
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is old and has arthritis. It helps to make her days more tolerable. Our vet recommended it for her 15 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: It's working!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old Rottweiler mix with arthritis in both hips. She's been on a prescription anti-inflammatory and it's helped, but she still wakes up stiff and limps after walks. I've also been worried about the long term side effects of the drug since she is so young. I found this and decided to give it a shot. I've been giving her a double dose for 1 week now along withand her regular medicine and she is already improving. She is getting up more easily in the morning and limping less. Also, she seems to like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: hartmc4

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've definitely seen a difference in my 8 year old shepherd mix. This works a lot better than the glucosomine I've given him. The only problem is he's a very smart dog and won't eat these pills at all unless I mash them to dust and mix it with something. Vanilla ice cream is is favorite blend
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wilds

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog with her limping.
customer_reviews.text: I was never sure if supplements really worked until I tried Joint Rescue from my dog that has hip issues. She loves the flavor of the big tablet it so giving her the twice daily dose is not a problem. Within about 3 weeks, I noticed that her limping had almost totally disappeared. I'm sold. As a matter of fact, this is my second order with this vendor. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louie L.

customer_reviews.title: Works good on mild to moderate inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I've used Joint Rescue with 2 of my dogs now (5 years apart). It's a good alternative to prescription anti inflammatory medication for mild to moderate problems.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I've seen much improvement with consistsnt use. My 12 y/o lab can run after the ball like she did years ago. She is getting up and down with less effort. I will continue to use this product
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: Ark Naturals Joint Rescue has worked for 2 of my dogs. Both of them suffer degenerative bone problems and this supplement seems to have given both of them relief. I now briskly walk both of them and neither has had soreness or limping afterwards. It may not be a cure, but it sure helps treat the discomfort AND naturally, without all of the heavy drugs they would ordinarily need to take to feel better. They like the taste, too, which helps.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donner

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying Joint Rescue for a few years now. This is a great product, has been a tremendous help for my 13-year-old three-legged Lab Mix. It has kept him going since his leg amputation in 2006. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Birgit Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our little 11 year old dog. 1/2 a pill every other day and his limp went away. It does work because we have ran out and he would start limping again. Great product and highly recommended 👍
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I give both my older dogs the listed dosage and it works wonderful for them. I can tell a difference when they are off of it. I ran out and they did not take it for about a week. Both of them were gimpy till they were back on it for a bit. I plan on never running out of it again.
customer_reviews.author: GenV

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff for Doggies from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these pills for my senior chocolate lab, Bear. We had tried the glucosamine chondroitin and prescription pain medicine from the vet for his joints. These pills came the closest to alleviating some of his discomfort. He has since crossed over the rainbow bridge but I am giving them to our 2 new rescued dogs. Why? Because they contain other valuable ingredients (e.g., turmeric, bromelain extract, yucca extract) that combined in one tasty pill prevents me from having to give them these supplements separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinestate

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help my senior malamute
customer_reviews.text: I keep my senior malamute on this, and I feel that it has helped her stay active and lively, and she's going on 12 years old!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Minch

customer_reviews.title: Your dogs deserve this
customer_reviews.text: This product will change your dogs condition in weeks. When my older dog started slowing down and limping from arthritic hips, I used this product. In weeks, she was running at the dog park. I think this product is amazingly effective. I give it to my younger dogs also.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C. Kaestner

customer_reviews.title: Help an Old Dog Perform an Old Trick
customer_reviews.text: My twelve year old lab has arthrytis. Two pills a day and he is as spry as a pup. I first purchased this product at a local pet store and nearly fell over when I saw that they were charging $36.00 for a container of 60 tablets. Once I was convinced that the product worked wonders for my dog I happily discovered that Amazon vendors sell the same product at 50% off retail price. A careful shopper can also find re-occuring sales, discounts and free shipping on multiple orders. This is good stuff. If my dog could type I'm sure he would have submitted this opinion for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Muller

customer_reviews.title: This is the best joint supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is the best joint supplement. My dog has displacia and I have always given this to her. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Solimar Diaz Martin

customer_reviews.title: minpinmomof 3
customer_reviews.text: best arthritic joint relief for my 12 yr old minpin. knuckle joints swelling reduced to normal size
customer_reviews.author: minpinmom

customer_reviews.title: Much better alternative for dogs needing extra supplementation
customer_reviews.text: My lab with arthritis has been able to avoid costly prescription medications using these tablets. He thinks they are yummy too!
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for my older dog. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for my older dog. Since she cannot talk, I am not sure how well it is working, but she does not seem to be hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue gets my dog up and running again
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 9 months on my 12 year old lab. He had been having difficulty getting up and once up, he was dragging his leg. After using this product for 2-3 weeks, I began to notice improvement. Now he is back to running around in the yard and chasing cats and squirrels. He is obviously feeling much better. Before I found Joint Rescue, I tried 2 prescriptions medications and one supplement from the vet. This product has worked better for my dog than any of the other pills that I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie 804

customer_reviews.title: Effective product
customer_reviews.text: Ark Naturals Joint Rescue has definitely helped my 8 yr. old malamute with hip dysplasia. However, I do wish the manufacturer would improve the flavor as my dog will not eat the tablets out of hand and I need to crush the tablets into her food.
customer_reviews.author: L Larson

customer_reviews.title: Lab seems to like it too
customer_reviews.text: Since I've given this to my black lab, who is nine years old, I believe it helps with her stiffness. She is a retriever, so playing ball is high on her list of priorities, and she seems to want to continue long after I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: great for geriatric dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it has really helped my GSP who is 14 years young!! I have bought this before just not on Amazon. will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my dog for several months and have seen a huge improvement in her mobility since starting. She doesn't limp nearly as often and can go up and down the stairs again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue distaste...
customer_reviews.text: At first my American Bulldog ate the tablets right out of my hand but after 3 days, she didn't like them anymore. Even burying them in her food didn't work. She just pulled them out and put them beside her bowl. The product seemed to work in relieving her arthritis. Maybe we will try the jerky.
customer_reviews.author: AdWhiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Delivered on time and for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: GT Fan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs like the taste and it seems to make a difference in how well they get around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonders for my lab with hip dysplasia, much better than glucosamine/chondroitin alone.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old lab mix seems to have more mobility taking this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Belly

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue
customer_reviews.text: Very good service from the seller. the Joint Rescue has helped my Lab, with his bad hip, a bunch. I would recommend it for older dogs with joint troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. West

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE!!! My dog won't even lick at it let alone eat it. It does not do anything for my dog's health if he won't eat it. Not even hiding it in something else works. When I tried just hiding it in his regular food bowl, he would not eat his food until I completely emptied and washed the food bowl. It is HONESTLY that bad!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Haigler

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog has issues with getting up and down. This product has worked the very best to help him get around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for animals who have joint problems due to age, etc
customer_reviews.author: Golden

customer_reviews.title: seems to help
customer_reviews.text: This Seems to help my 11 yr old golden retriever dog... he likes to take them out of my hand, so they must taste good...
customer_reviews.author: MikeNewark

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really helped my dogs! Especially my old dog. He gets around better having been on this for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue can't cure arthritis, but it has helped
customer_reviews.text: We have had all of our dogs on this product for over 2 years. Joint Rescue has kept all 5 of our dogs more comfortable & flexible & it has eased the stiffness of our 2 older dogs (a 8 year old boxer & a 14 year old Cairn Terrier).
customer_reviews.author: Renae Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Probably will work if dog eats it...
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT know if these work because although I have used many methods to disguise these pills my dogs (Doberman and a White Shepherd) find them to be terribly unappetizing and refuse to eat them! Alternatively I bought this great product Vet's Best:  Pro: Great formula, probably effective. Cons: Unappetizing. Huge, 1" size pills!
customer_reviews.author: emp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My dog is able to walk without ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog is able to walk without a limp within 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine mcelwee

customer_reviews.title: amazing difference
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retriever is 16+ and has arthritis. He's been on similar products for many years but none have come close to giving the kind of results that Joint Rescue does. We were skeptics before and believers now.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey w harrisson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a yellow lab and is 6 years old... he was having trouble with this hips now he is strong and can run again with no problem...!!! I love this product, they brought me back my Polo...
customer_reviews.author: P. de Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Doberman
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept my 11 year old Doberman strong and active for the past several years. We swear by it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Cateyes

customer_reviews.title: not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping that it takes a while for this to build up, I'd like to see more relief for my dogs and their sore/weak hips and back ends. The price was the BEST I could find anywhere online. The dogs dont mind the taste, the tablets are always gone from their bowls.
customer_reviews.author: BorderCollieMom

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Best joint tablets that I've found and my Sheltie thinks he is getting a treat everyday. They really seem to have helped with his joint flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: tropicalmk

customer_reviews.title: I used to just set the tablet on the floor next to his food dish and he ate it like dessert. Now he's older with health problems
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders for my dog's joint pain. I used to just set the tablet on the floor next to his food dish and he ate it like dessert. Now he's older with health problems and finicky...it's not as easy. My guy is a smaller dog....they work just as great on my great granddog, a b i g chocolate lab who has real joint problems!
customer_reviews.author: Memoe

customer_reviews.title: I have a seven year old great dane that takes these with every meal and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a seven year old great dane that takes these with every meal and it makes such a difference! She is much more bouncy and younger acting in energy and spunk when she is regularly taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bazemore

customer_reviews.title: Watch out Mr. Squirrel!
customer_reviews.text: My lab mix has hip issues. Before he started taking this his legs would give out on him occasionally. He is more active now and has begun to chase Mr. Squirrel again!
customer_reviews.author: Chellie

customer_reviews.title: My dog is jumping for joy (literally)
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yo dog is running & jumping around again like a much younger dog since we started giving her this supplement a few weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: yogagal

customer_reviews.title: Joint Rescue
customer_reviews.text: This product helps our dog with her arthritis. She won't eat the pills straight out of the bottle so we break them up into little pieces & mix with her dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got fast service and received what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: 420jen

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: The dog likes them, but I have no way to know about safety or effectiveness. I am not buying them as a treat. Too many indistinguishable products like this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Robson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for canine. Charlie has hip dysplacia and arthritis, this product has helped him so much.
customer_reviews.author: DeeCee10

customer_reviews.title: Won't touch it
customer_reviews.text: Neither my cats nor my dog will eat it. I've tried breaking in half cutting in quarters. They will eat everything but this :(
customer_reviews.author: Barbranne D. HerreraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: nauseating
customer_reviews.text: My dog kept throwing up after I put them in her food. Finally, I made the taste test, and understood why - The taste is absolutely disgusting. They are completely unpalatable. And this company does not accept returns - so this was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: ... product for our senior pug Maisy and she did great. It seems the formula changed so it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled - we had bought this product for our senior pug Maisy and she did great. It seems the formula changed so it makes it hard to break up into small pieces and our Mia is not doing any better. Not happy - won't buy again... :(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: My dog will not eat them, even when I ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat them, even when I crush them up and sprinkle on his food he won''t eat the food. So I'm not sure if they work or not.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for some dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a joint issue on his hind legs, he was constantly limping. My vet recommended that I add glucosamine to his diet, so i purchased this product. At first it seemed to work so I started giving him this in his food daily, we ran out in the 6 month period, mind you he was still limping, once we stopped giving him this product his limp actually went away. We tried giving it to him about 3 months later and the limp returned, since removing this from his diet he has had ZERO issues. So at this point, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Erwin

product_meta.title: Ark Naturals Joint Rescue Super Strength Chews for All Dog Breeds, Vet Recommended to Support Cartilage and Joint Function, Eliminate Joint Discomfort, Turmeric, Chondroitin and Glucosamine
product_meta.description: Size:90 countArk Naturals combination of Glucosamine, Chondroitin, herbs, and antioxidants make this joint product the best in its class. A natural way to “rescue” your pet from the difficulties dogs may experience due to long walks, jumping on couches, hiking, running, and age related immobility. Turmeric and Yucca help relieve aches and inflammation while Glucosamine and Chondroitin mixed with Ark's blend of comfort producing herbs can help your dog feel better and bring the joy back to their active lifestyle. Carefully Crafted in the USA.
feature_bullets: FORMULATED FOR ALL AGES: Vet recommended dog chew formulated for all dog ages that are 25 lbs and up.
MAXIMUM JOINT SOLUTION: Supports cartilage and joint function to relieve discomfort associated with exercise.
ALL NATURAL FORMULA: Each serving contains Yucca, turmeric, Chondroitin, and 500mg of glucosamine
DAILY DOSAGE: Double the daily recommended amount for 4 weeks, thereafter reduce to maintenance recommendations.
CAREFULLY CRAFTED IN THE USA: Our recipe is formulated with high quality and natural ingredients that are corn free, soy free, wheat free, and have no artificial colors or preservatives.
